title: Poetry Pack - Homer, Hesiod, Lucretius, Virgil, Ovid, Dante
description:
Famous and enduring works of epic and didactic poetry presented here in [among] the best English-language translations available. The included verse translations are arguably the best ones available, especially for first-time readers of these poems, in that they are both readable and stay true to the meaning of the originals.

Included ebooks that are tagged with the label "REDUX EDITION" are custom-made high-quality PDF renderings that address various defects or inadequacies present in the original sources/formats on which they are based.

Also included are relevant additional readings that enhance the understanding and appreciation of these classics
